column4: While trying to install GIMP, im getting a 'Package dependencies cannot be resolved' error. Full message at http://paste.ubuntu.com/620967/. How can I fix this? TIA!
and try to install GIMP inr ecovery mode?
you' ll see, recovery mode shows a menu
alt-tab and dash menu - update manager
Alt+ab does not work and is 'dash' a command?
in Unity, dash is the menu
I'm not using uinity but gnome
I'm not using unity 3d, I hate it; but then classic gnome is giving me so much trouble
that is a file manager; what i'm looking for is a document manager; a software to catalog, obtain, sort and so on, documents
